PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ProtectiveDeviceBreakerUnitTypeMotorProtection
PropertySetDef.Definition: A coherent set of attributes representing different capacities of a a motor protection device, defined in accordance with IEC 60947. Note - A protective device may be associated with different instances of this Pset.

PropertyDef.Name: PerformanceClasses
PropertyDef.Definition: A set of designations of performance classes for the breaker unit for which the data of this instance is valid. A breaker unit being a motor protection device may be constructed for different levels of breaking capacities. A maximum of 7 different performance classes may be provided. Examples of performance classes that may be specified include B, C, N, S, H, L, V.

PropertyDef.Name: VoltageLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: The voltage levels of the protective device for which the data of the instance is valid. More than one value may be selected in the enumeration.

PropertyDef.Name: ICU60947
PropertyDef.Definition: The ultimate breaking capacity in [A] for a circuit breaker or motor protection device tested in accordance with the IEC 60947 series.

PropertyDef.Name: ICS60947
PropertyDef.Definition: The service breaking capacity in [A] for a circuit breaker or motor protection device tested in accordance with the IEC 60947 series.

PropertyDef.Name: ICW60947
PropertyDef.Definition: The thermal withstand current in [A] for a circuit breaker or motor protection device tested in accordance with the IEC 60947 series. The value shall be related to 1 s.

PropertyDef.Name: ICM60947
PropertyDef.Definition: The making capacity in [A] for a circuit breaker or motor protection device tested in accordance with the IEC 60947 series.
